content.webTitle: Cirque du Soleil: Quidam, Canberra | Event listing

fields.headline: Cirque du Soleil: Quidam, Canberra
fields.bodyText: Cirque du Soleil’s Quidam begins with a bored young girl, named Zoe, who is ignored by her parents and lost in the crowd of modern society. Seeking to fill the void, she slides into the imaginary world of Quidam, where she meets a host of characters who encourage her to free her soul. Quidam debuted in Montreal in 1996 and has become one of the company’s most popular shows. The international cast of 46 acrobats, musicians, singers and actors present Cirque du Soleil’s signature feats and ambitious acrobatics. Type of Event: Theatre Venue: AIS Arena Leverrier St Bruce ACT 2617 Date: from 10 to 20 December 2015 Price: from $62 Website: Ticketek Telephone: (02) 6214 1007 Sign up to our weekly culture newsletter:
